label: wicket_only
text:
Previous over: End of over 6 - 8 off it. Boundaries from Dilshan kept it lively. A measured over with steady rotation. Over 7 begins. caught at slip! And Zaheer
hasn't conceded a run yet. Zaheer pitches the ball on a length around off, forcing Tharanga... Sangakkara scores the first run off Zaheer by dabbing towards
mid-on and setting off at top speed short ball and Dilshan swivels and pulls towards the fielder on the deep square leg boundary Sangakkara strides forward and
drives a length ball from outside off to the fielder at cover, nicely timed shot! Stopped! Sangakkara lashed a full ball off the front foot, making superb
contact with the cover drive, Raina was... short of a length and straight, Sangakkara gets behind the line and defends End of over 7: 2 runs, 1 wicket (Upul
Tharanga).

label: boundary_four_only
text:
Previous over: 0 off over 5. A measured over with steady rotation. Over 6 begins. and there it is! A touch too short and Dilshan dismisses it with a pull off
the front foot, hit in the air but over... Sreesanth beats Dilshan's attempt at a booming drive on the up with a delivery that pitches short of a length
outside... and again! Dilshan releases the pressure by cutting a short and wide ball from outside off to the backward point... tighter line and length closer to
off stump, Dilshan punches towards cover Dilshan tries to drive through the line on the front foot but doesn't make good contact with a length delivery on
off,... a touch slower and a lot straighter around middle and off, Dilshan tries to drive again but slices it towards point End of over 6: 8 runs.

label: boundary_six_only
text:
Previous over: Over 43: 5 runs. A measured over with steady rotation. Over 44 begins. Six over point! Wankhede goes mental! It was the shortish delivery outside
off and Dhoni hopped, rode the bounce and... Almost run out! It was jabbed, off bat and pad, to point and the ball rolled to point. Yuvraj dashed across for
the... leans forward to turn to the leg side for a single in the zone outside off and Dhoni jabs and stabs and the ball rushes past the edge slower, on the
middle, turned to midwicket. Yuvraj is standing on the practice track close to the centre pitch! Not at... short in length, extra bounce on that one and Dhoni
adjusts to shove it to cover End of over 44: 8 runs.

label: wicket_and_boundary
text: Over 27: 3 runs. Over 28, Sangakkara takes a neat two through cover, then launches a brilliant four, clipping Yuvraj and sending it to the boundary, then pulls off a single, Jayawardene singles off the next ball, then Sangakkara is caught behind attempting a cut, and Samaraweera ends the over with a dot.

label: four_and_six
text:
Previous over: 8 off over 49. The highlight: Perera find the rope. Apart from that, it stays controlled. Over 50 begins. Zaheer bowls one full on the stump, and
Thisara smokes it down to long off, absolutely smoked Zaheer follows Mahela down the leg side with a yorker, but Mahela is in such good touch that he manages to
squeeze it... serves up a low full around off stump, and thisara makes some room, and whacks it past extra cover for another... that is why Kula came in ahead
of Thisara, who can take off in these end overs, gets a full delivery, and launches it... super commitment from Mahela, it was slogged wide of deep midwicket,
Mahela pushed Thisara for the second, and backed... 63 runs off the batting Powerplay, 22 off 9 for Thisara, gets a fuller delivery in his swinging zone,
swivels, and... End of over 50: 18 runs.
